description.moremekasuitmodules.health_r: When the player is running low on health, it automatically restores health
description.moremekasuitmodules.emergenc: When the player is dying, they consume a unit to regenerate health
description.moremekasuitmodules.advanced: The upgraded version of the emergency rescue unit will not be consumed
description.moremekasuitmodules.insulate: Directs electricity to the ground to prevent injury
description.moremekasuitmodules.energy_s: Use an energy shield to block damage
description.moremekasuitmodules.infinite: Keep MekaSuit full of energy at all times
Exhausted of the resources of the infinite dimension, this unit was finally born, and when this unit is installed, you will not get hurt
Keep your body always filled with fluids/chemicals
description.moremekasuitmodules.automati: Automatically attack all creatures within the range of the player.
description.moremekasuitmodules.power_en: Increases the user's attack speed and damage
description.moremekasuitmodules.high_spe: Speed up the use of cooling items.
description.moremekasuitmodules.hp_boots: Increases the maximum maximum health of the user
module.moremekasuitmodules.infinite_inte: Infinite interception and rescue system unit
module.moremekasuitmodules.damage_1: Exclusion of direct sources of harm
module.moremekasuitmodules.damage_2: Exclusion of indirect sources of damage.
module.moremekasuitmodules.emergency_res: Warn! The user has been hit hard! Intercepted!
description.moremekasuitmodules.band_of_: Mana can be slowly created at a rate of 5 mana/tick and stored in items that can carry mana
description.moremekasuitmodules.basic_ba: Mana can be slowly created at a rate of 10 mana/tick and stored in items that can carry mana
description.moremekasuitmodules.advanced: Mana can be slowly created at a rate of 15 mana/tick and stored in items that can carry mana
description.moremekasuitmodules.elite_ba: Mana can be slowly created at a rate of 20 mana/tick and stored in items that can carry mana
description.moremekasuitmodules.ultimate: Mana can be slowly created at a rate of 25 mana/tick and stored in items that can carry mana
description.moremekasuitmodules.creative: ana can be slowly created at a rate of §6§k2147483647§r§7 mana/tick and stored in items that can carry mana
description.moremekasuitmodules.smart_sh: Through chip analysis, it automatically blocks the other party's gaze
